basic_info.description2: I stay updated on the latest trends, especially within the React ecosystem. Check out my evolving portfolio, showcasing projects in React JS, Node, Firebase, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I am actively seeking new opportunities, I'm open to collaborations and excited to contribute to fun projects.

projects.title: Facial Recognition
projects.description: This application allows you to pull any image and, using the Carifai API, it will find the face(s) in the picture. This project has a frontend written in JavaScript and React and a backend written in Node, Express, and uses PostgreSQL for a database.

projects.title: Preferred Ecommerce (PE)
projects.description: This is an ecommerce site that uses Redux/Redux Saga for state management. It manages state for user, the catalog of products, and the users cart. As a backend, Firebase was used. Firebase Auth was used to create a user, login in an exsisting user, and provide functionality to log in from a users Google account. The Firebase database was used to store users information. Stripe was also intergrated into the application so the user can make payments.

projects.title: PE - TypeScript Version
projects.description: *** Still under construction *** This project has all of the same features as the previous project but is type safe! TypeScript was added to the componets, Redux, Redux Saga, and the utility files. I will also be adding GraphQL
